text_logic_form: The triangle $ABC$ is a right triangle.
The length of the line $BC$ is $6$ units.
Find the length of the line $AB$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangle $ABC$ is a right triangle.
The length of the line $BC$ is $6$ units.
Find the length of the line $AB$.
diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $BAC$ is $4x$ degrees.
The measure of angle $CBA$ is $2x$ degrees.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $CB$, forming the triangle $ABC$.
